Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires public utility authorities to obtain legislative approval before raising rates or fees, or imposing new rates or fees
Summary: Requires public utility authorities to obtain legislative approval before raising rates or fees, or imposing new rates or fees.
LawCode: Add ยง2859, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring public utility authorities to obtain legislative approval before raising rates or fees
